sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import products from '../products' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' const ProductScreen = () => { const { id } = useParams() const product = products.find(product => product._id === id) return ( <> Go ðŸ”™ Back {product.name} Price: ${product.price} Description: {product.description} Price: ${product.price} Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In Stock' : 'Out of Stock'} ) } export default ProductScreen
